title: DevSecOps Module Registry Entry
description: Schema for DevSecOps module entries in the taxonomy registry. Tracks schemas, configs, and potential L'Orage-branded library implementations.

description.description: Brief description of the DevSecOps module's purpose

rationale.description: Why this module exists and its role in the DevSecOps ecosystem

has_schema.description: Whether this module has JSON schemas

has_config.description: Whether this module has config defaults

potential_libraries.description: L'Orage-branded or DevSecOps helper libraries that might implement this module (e.g., goloragecentral, pyloragecentral)

consumers.description: Applications, tools, or services that consume this module's schemas (e.g., fulmen-secrets, lorage-daemon)

status.description: Current lifecycle status of the module

added_version.description: Crucible version when module was added

deprecated_version.description: Crucible version when module was deprecated (if applicable)

notes.description: Additional notes about the module, its usage, or architectural decisions
